p: According to the results presented in Table 7, ET CE showed significant antifungal activity against Candida albicans and Saccharomyces cerevisiae with MIC of 6.25 mg/mL and 12.5 mg/mL respectively. Concerning the inhibition zone diameter assay ( Table 8), But CE and ET CE induced an inhibition zone diameter against Saccharomyces cerevisiae and Candida albicans with 12 mm and 14 mm respectively.
